Suatu hari, pendekar buta Kasa dan anak perempuannya Delima berkunjung ke kampung Sitara. Ketika di rumah Sitara, terbongkarlah rahsia bahawa Kasa sebenarnya adalah Datuk Merah.

programme.title: Jambatan Maut
programme.desc: Untuk mempertahankan maruah diri daripada diganggu Haron, Hamidah telah mengambil keputusan untuk terjun ke dalam sungai dari sebuah jambatan. Dia kemudiannya dibawa arus deras dan hilang entah ke mana walaupun seorang lelaki bernama Ibrahim cuba menolongnya. Ibrahim yang dihalau keluar oleh bapanya tinggal di pondok berhampiran dengan jambatan di mana Hamidah terjun ke dalam sungai. Sedang Ibrahim mengarang lagu, Hamidah telah datang kepadanya dan mula timbul bibit-bibit cinta antara mereka. Hamidah juga memberitahu kepada Ibrahim bahawa dia ingin menghukum Haron dan rakan-rakannya yang sering mengancam keamanan kampung.

programme.title: Satria
programme.desc: Bongkok seorang pemuda cacat sejak dia dilahirkan. Dia sering dipandang hina oleh orang kampung kerana sifatnya yang tidak sempurna. Bongkok mempunyai seorang adik bernama Putra yang handal dalam ilmu persilatan. Putra memendam perasaan terhadap Wati, anak Tok Ketua. Pada suatu hari, Putra bersama rakannya, Durja dan beberapa orang pendekar telah diarahkan untuk menjadi utusan perdamaian antara Tok Ketua dengan Panglima Jalit. Malangnya rundingan perdamaian itu gagal dan berlaku pertumpahan darah. Bongkok pula membawa diri ke suatu tempat untuk mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan Pak Guru. Satu komplot telah dibuat oleh Durja untuk merampas Wati daripada Putra.

programme.title: Norlela
programme.desc: Putera Amran, pewaris takhta kerajaan Zamin Ambar telah dititahkan oleh ayahandanya untuk berkahwin dengan Puteri Faridah dari kerajaan Zamin Tauran. Namun, Putera Amran tidak bersetuju dengan titah ayahandanya kerana dia mencintai seorang penari istana yang bernama Norlela. Kerajaan Zamin Tauran berasa amat terhina dan merancang sesuatu untuk mengambil alih tampuk pemerintahan kerajaan Zamin Ambar dengan cara Puteri Faridah mesti berkahwin dengan baginda sultan Zamin Tauran.

programme.title: Putera Sangkar Maut
programme.desc: Sultan sering menyamar sebagai peminta sedekah untuk melihat sikap rakyat jelatanya dengan lebih dekat. Pada suatu hari, Sultan telah membuat keputusan untuk berkahwin dengan seorang gadis bernama Nilam dan mengahwinkan kakak Nilam yang bernama Dian dengan Mamanda Menteri. Dian enggan berkahwin dengan Mamanda Menteri kerana dia ingin menjadi isteri Sultan. Namun atas nasihat kekasihnya Panglima Jahang, Dian berkahwin dengan Mamanda Menteri sebagai satu helah untuk menggulingkan pemerintahan Sultan.

programme.title: Panggilan Pulau
programme.desc: Percintaan antara Zulkifli dan Jelita mendapat tentangan daripada Johan yang merupakan abang kepada Jelita. Akibat sering dihina kerana tidak memiliki harta, Zulkifli membawa diri dan menjadi kelasi kapal dengan bantuan Umar dan Ramlee. Kehadiran Zulkifli di kapal itu tidak disenangi oleh Kapten dan dua orang kanannya, Musa dan Shukur. Pada suatu hari, kapal yang dinaiki Zulkifli telah karam di lautan dan dia terdampar di sebuah pulau yang bernama Kezambo. Apabila Zulkifli sedar yang dia kini berada di Pulau Kezambo, dia meminta izin kepada penghulu untuk mencari harta karun yang tersimpan di pulau itu.

programme.title: Semerah Cindai
programme.desc: Kelana mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan Mahaguru Buana untuk membalas dendam kepada orang-orang yang membunuh kedua ibu bapanya. Selepas tamat perguruan, Kelana bertemu dengan seorang lelaki tua bernama Bagok, seorang pemabuk dan kaki judi. Dia mempunyai seorang anak gadis bernama Atma. Tanpa disedari Kelana, Bagok adalah salah seorang penyamun yang membunuh ibu bapanya.

programme.title: Pendekar Sakti

programme.title: Siti Zubaidah
programme.desc: Apabila seorang rakyatnya dihukum penjara seumur hidup atas kesalahan menipu, Kerajaan Tartar telah mengisytiharkan perang terhadap negeri Kembayat Negara yang diperintah oleh Sultan Zainal Abidin. Apabila perang meletus, kerajaan Tartar berjaya menakluk Kembayat Negara serta menangkap baginda sultan. Siti Zubaidah, isteri kepada baginda sultan merancang untuk membebaskan suaminya daripada tahanan serta menyerang kerajaan Tartar dengan bantuan kerajaan Yunan.

programme.title: Isi Neraka
programme.desc: Kedatangan agama Islam di sebuah kampung tidak disenangi oleh Wira dan rakan-rakannya. Mereka yang gemar membuat kacau di kampung itu sering mengganggu penyebaran dakwah Islam. Kehadiran Tuan Guru ke kampung itu juga telah membuatkan lebih ramai orang kampung memeluk Islam, namun Wira tetap mempersoalkan kekuasaan Tuhan.

programme.desc: Leslie dibawa ke pusat pemulihan ketagihan dadah. Sepanjang penginapannya, dia membongkar rahsia gelap yang menghantui dinding Hospicio.

programme.title: Ibu Menuntunku Ke Surga
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Jaka dan Rani yang menyuruh orang untuk membakar rumah ibunya sendiri supaya mereka dapat menjual rumah itu selepas kebakaran.

programme.title: Variety Jom Wayang S12 Ep10
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep4
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Seorang jutawan telah mewasiatkan kepada peguamnya supaya mencari waris-warisnya yang berhak menerima harta bernilai lebih dari RM30 juta. Semua waris disyaratkan supaya berada di bangalo arwah di sebuah bukit peranginan selama 33 hari bagi melayakkan mereka mewarisi harta pusaka tersebut.

programme.title: Aku Yang Berhormat
programme.desc: Dua sahabat sebagai petani menanam kopi tinggal dikampung yang sama. Mereka bersikap Bersih, Cekap dan Amanah telah dipilih menjadi seorang wakil rakyat yang berjaya.

programme.title: 11:11:Apa Yang Kau Lihat?
programme.desc: Pada suatu malam pada pukul 11:11 tepat, Galih, seorang pelajar arkeologi yang suka menyelam dan fotografi, menemui keberadaan Dewi, ibunya. Dewi menghilangkan diri ketika Galih masih kecil di sebuah pulau terpencil bernama Tanjung Biru.

programme.title: Tmo Minyak Dagu
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Minyak Dagu

programme.title: Keeping Your Heart
programme.desc: Bagi Trang, hidupnya kelihatan baik-baik saja dengan isteri yang cantik serta anak lelaki dan perempuan yang masih remaja. Tetapi apabila seorang artis muda yang bertenaga dan cantik masuk ke galerinya dengan lukisannya, dia bukan satu-satunya yang jatuh cinta kepadanya, anaknya juga menyukai anak saudara artis itu. Isterinya mula menyedari sesuatu sedang berlaku dalam keluarga, terutamanya apabila dia mendapat tahu bahawa anak perempuannya telah berjumpa dengan seorang mekanik muda miskin.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep13
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Fainow
programme.desc: kisah pergolakan rumah tangga sepasang suami isteri selepas sang isteri mendapat tahu kecurangan suaminya.

programme.title: Kasih Farrah
programme.desc: isu dendam oleh seorang lelaki dengan seorang wanita yang berlaku lebih 25 tahun dahulu, secara tidak sengaja lelaki itu pula bercinta dengan anak perempuan bekas kekasihnya sewaktu mereka berdua menuntut di luar negara.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep5
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Mike dan Yo yang memasuki kelab pertarungan bawah tanah yang dipanggil "Fighting Fish" di mana kematian tidak dapat dielakkan bagi yang kalah dalam pertarungan.

programme.title: Tmo Pada Suatu Cinta Dahulu

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Gina dan Jo yang bertemu secara tak sengaja dan berpakat untuk memastikan Hardy dan Nita tak jadi berkahwin dengan bantuan dua lagi rakan mereka iaitu Lola dan Tompy.

programme.title: Mache Fusion
programme.desc: Mahmud bercita-cita untuk menjadi seorang Chef yang berjaya. Semenjak Mahmud merasai masakan pesaing ibunya, dia merancang untuk membuka gerai masakan tradisional & fusion di kampungnya.

programme.title: Silang
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Amir seorang pereka grafik yang baru sahaja berkahwin dengan Dura. Selepas berkahwin, barulah Dura sedar yang Amir mempunyai masalah disleksia kronik dan anak mereka juga ada masalah sama.

programme.title: Bob Punya Baby
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki dan seorang wanita masing-masing memalsukan profail mereka dengan menggunakan gambar orang lain dan nama samaran untuk profail facebook mereka

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Gina dan Jo yang bertemu secara tak sengaja dan berpakat untuk memastikan Hardy dan Nita tak jadi berkahwin dengan bantuan dua lagi rakan mereka iaitu Lola dan Tompy.

programme.title: Suami Sabar Dalam Dekapan Istri Serakah
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang suami (Ridwan) yang sabar dengan sifat isterinya (Rina). Rina berubah menjadi seorang yang tidak peduli akan keluarga setelah mempunyai anak dan pekerjaan Ridwan muflis.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep1
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Sempurnanya Istri Yang Sabar
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Hanum, yang sabar dan tabah menghadapi dugaan suaminya yang terkena ilmu hitam.

programme.title: Cinta Tak Semudah Dot Com
programme.desc: Seorang ejen hartanah lelaki muda yang miskin telah menyamar sebagai tuan punya sebuah banglo kepada seorang pelanggan wanita yang cantik dan diingati kaya tetapi mempunyai musilhat. Wanita tersebut yang merupakan seorang penjual kosmetik tiruan telah menyamar sebagai seorang wanita kaya dengan tujuan untuk mencari dan berkahwin dengan lelaki kaya.

programme.title: Love Languageku Padamu Huoo Huoo
programme.desc: Manda dan Arvan baru pulang bercuti secara tidak sengaja mereka menaiki teksi bersama, walaupun Manda yang menempah teksi terlebih dahulu. Tanpa disedari, Manda memikul bagasi Arvan begitu juga sebaliknya. Bukan sahaja bagasi mereka ditukar, malah hati mereka juga.

programme.title: Juara Indonesia Ramadan Ep13
programme.desc: Satu pertandingan kuiz di mana kanak-kanak menguji pengetahuan dan kecekapan mereka dalam menjawab soalan dengan cepat dan tepat, terutamanya yang berkaitan dengan bulan Ramadan.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep8
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: D'Academy 6 Ep24
programme.desc: D'Academy Musim 6 (DA6) merupakan acara pencarian bakat menyanyi dangdut untuk musim keenam D'Academy.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta Ep37
programme.desc: Starla dan Niko merupakan pasangan yang sempurna. Mereka mempunyai dua orang anak, iaitu Nila dan Daffa. Walaupun begitu, Niko secara rahsia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Ayu, rakan lama Starla dan Niko dari sekolah menengah. Mereka berdua cuba menyembunyikan hubungan tersebut dari siapa pun. Suatu hari, Ilham, suami Ayu, melihat mereka bermesraan di dalam kereta. Niko dan Ayu melarikan diri, Ilham mengejar mereka. Malangnya, mereka bertiga akhirnya terlibat dalam kemalangan.

programme.title: Kukira FTV Ternyata Kisahku
programme.desc: Laluan Didin untuk menjadi ketua kampung terhalang kerana kemunculan Sarah secara tiba-tiba. Didin resah apabila Sarah menangkap simpati penduduk. Akhirnya, kedua-duanya bersaing untuk mendapatkan jawatan ketua kampung.

programme.title: Terbangun Dari Mati Suri
programme.desc: Pasangan suami isteri, Firman dan Siska, yang dikenali sebagai pencuri kedai emas, kembali beraksi pada siang itu. Walau bagaimanapun, aksi jenayah mereka gagal dengan teruk kerana ditangkap salah seorang pengunjung kedai emas yang baru masuk ke kedai. Firman dan kumpulannya dengan cepat melarikan diri untuk menyelamatkan diri dan bersurai. Firman berlari ke arah motornya dan secara tidak sengaja melanggar seorang kanak-kanak bernama Nina yang baru keluar dari kedai bersama ibunya membeil-belah. Firman hampir hendak memarahi Nina, tetapi Siska dengan cepat meraih tangannya dan membawanya lari dengan tergesa-gesa.

programme.title: Juara Indonesia Ramadan Ep16
programme.desc: Satu pertandingan kuiz di mana kanak-kanak menguji pengetahuan dan kecekapan mereka dalam menjawab soalan dengan cepat dan tepat, terutamanya yang berkaitan dengan bulan Ramadan.

programme.title: AKSI Indonesia Ep5
programme.desc: 24 Ustaz dan Ustazah dari pelbagai wilayah di Indonesia mengambil langkah untuk menang dengan melibatkan diri dalam pelbagai aktiviti Islamik yang menghiburkan dan bermakna. Saksikan dakwah mereka beraksi bersama para pengulas.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: The Goblin
programme.desc: After ten years in jail, Doohyun is released and wants nothing more than to live an ordinary life, but when his old partner kidnaps his daughter, the long-hidden Goblin inside him awakes.

programme.title: Josee
programme.desc: Yong Seok helps Jose to get home after finding she has fallen from her electric wheelchair. From then on, the two meet up more often and starts developing feeling for one another.

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: A timid, overweight and under-appreciated back-up singer resorts to drastic "head-to-toe" plastic surgery to become a pop diva.

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: Swing Kids
programme.desc: The story of a North Korean soldier who joined the tap dancing team "Swing Kids" in the Geoje prison camp during the Korean War.

programme.title: War Of The Arrows
programme.desc: Set during the second Manchu invasion of Korea, Nam Yi, the best archer in Korea, goes up against the Qing Dynasty to rescue his younger sister Ja In - who was to be enslaved by the Manchurians.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the ChinaNorth Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: Papa
programme.desc: A Korean talent agent arrives in America and goes through with a fake marriage to stay there. However, his fake wife later dies in a car accident, leaving him with her six children.

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: A washed-up former hit producer and a young man with stage fear while aspiring to be a singer head off on a road trip filled with music and jamming sessions.

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: Seven Days
programme.desc: A lawyer with a 100% winning rate was threatened to defend and set a murderer free in 7 days to save her abducted daughter. The race against time begins...

programme.title: Boys Be!
programme.desc: When two high school friends the best fighter in school and the other who hates physical conflict get involved in a fight involving local mobsters, they discover the true meaning of friendship.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: Highway Family
programme.desc: A grieving mother met a homeless young family taking shelter in highway rest areas when they asks her for money.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: A music teacher was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation.

programme.title: Single In Seoul
programme.desc: Yeong-Ho is a famous influencer who praises living a single life. Hyeon-Jin is an editor who is desperate about finding her partner. The two meets while working together for a book.

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: The Art Of Seduction
programme.desc: Min-jun and Ji-won are first-rate "players" who are used to getting their way in the field of love and sex -- until they run into each other.

programme.title: Secretly, Greatly
programme.desc: 3 North Korean spies who have been living and bonding in South Korea's community for years got the order to take their own life after a sudden power change in their government. What would they choose?

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep1213
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2860
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep989
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep1617
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep48294830
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2166
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3781
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2860
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3781
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep48304831
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep1819
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2167
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa (T) Ep198
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Player
programme.desc: Chinese Feng Shui master, Carson (Chapman To) was a "Natural Born Player", taking names and breaking hearts. Fate had it that he would meet his match, the hot veterinarian, Chi-Ling (Chrissie Chau). It was love at first sight but neither could stand the other's fickle nature lest the affair might have ended as soon as it began.

programme.title: Come Back Home
programme.desc: In a chilly winter, De and his family goes on a self-drive tour to Changbai Mountain. The holiday turns tragic when Des eight-year-old son goes missing. He seeks help from the local police but is unable to find his son. Though the golden hour has passed, De and the rescue team insist on continuing the search. Can they finally rescue the boy?

programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei has posttraumatic stress disorder after his wife's death. One day, he encounters Amy who works for a VR technology firm and is invited for a new product test. After the test, Long Wei becomes the firms VR fighter and dons the newly invented armour. However, as mysterious armed men break in, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: Hell Hole
programme.desc: The movie features three horror stories in different era: a pregnant woman haunted by a ghost sacrifices her life to save her baby; a boy commits suicide after being bullied by four medical students and his spirit returns for revenge; some company staff are haunted after they open a box of used clothes, releasing a more than 20-year resentment.

programme.title: 12 Golden Ducks
programme.desc: This is a comeback story about the misadventures of a group of gigolos, led by Future, trying to make their mark in Hong Kong. As with any profession, they have their share of setbacks, but their ability to find laughter within the tears reflects the drive, passion and the indomitable spirit of the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: Song of Spring
programme.desc: An 85-year-old mother lives with her 65-year-old daughter who is suffering from Alzheimer's disease, causing her to suffer a decline in memory, mental confusion and disorientation. Though the elderly mother has to shoulder the burden of a caregiver, she still wants to be with her daughter forever.

programme.title: May Who?
programme.desc: The story is about a super standard girl in school, May Who, is on a quest to win the love of a school senior heart-throbber, Fame, with her new-found friend, Pong. The only secret is that she can discharge electricity when she gets excited

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenixs (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: Phua Chu Kang: The Movie
programme.desc: Ah Ma visits Phua Chu Kang, who is now based in Malaysia, but soon goes missing. Phua desperately searches for Ah Ma and finds her in a nursing home run by Lim Lau Pek, who unexpectedly offers Phua a renovation job. When suspicious deaths start occurring in the nursing home, Lim becomes the prime suspect. How will Phua resolve this?

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Fall in Love at First Kiss
programme.desc: In this romantic love story starring Taiwanese actors Darren Wang and Jelly Lin, an ordinary girl develops a stubborn crush on the school genius after an unexpected kiss. But with the genius adored by everyone in the school, can their relationship blossom and develop?

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Chois actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the ministers conspiracy

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: ambushing a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency and send it to a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: Someday or One Day
programme.desc: The movie is a spin-off from the TV series of the same name. While Huang Yu Xuan mourns the death of her boyfriend, she receives a mysterious cassette player that allows her to travel back in time. She meets her boyfriend then again, but will she be able to change his destiny?

programme.title: Wu Kong
programme.desc: Set 500 years before the Monkey King Wu Kong wreaks havoc in the heavenly kingdom, the movie tells the story of how Wu Kong who, unwilling to bow to his own destiny, sets out to rebel against the gods.

programme.title: Viral
programme.desc: Following the outbreak of a virus that wipes out the majority of the human population, a young woman documents her family's new life in quarantine and tries to protect her infected sister.

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: The Grand Grandmaster
programme.desc: Ma Fei Lung, a Chinese martial arts grandmaster, lost everything after he is floored by a former female boxing champion, Chan Tsang. The relevant video was posted on social media and he became the laughing stock of everyone. To reclaim his reputation, Fei Lung challenges Chan Tsang to a rematch. Who will be the winner?

programme.title: Lonely Eighteen
programme.desc: Set in the 1980s Hong Kong, Elaine and her best friend Ying enter the entertainment industry hoping to change their fates from poverty. Ying soon becomes a popular porn star but Elaine is lost between being her true self and an actress. When show business declines after a decade, their choices lead them to two different paths in life.

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran, Wu Wei and an undercover cop, Tian Ming lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok. As they are about to leave after the rescue, Wu finds that his daughter is also kidnapped, and decides to stay on with Ming to fight the thugs and save her.

programme.title: A Chinese Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Young demon hunter Yan loves the fox spirit Xiao Qian but has to rid her memories of him as a human cannot love a demon. Years later, Ning meets Xiao Qian and they fall in love. Yan advises Ning to give Xiao Qian up as she is now controlled by an evil Tree Demon but he refuses. As the Tree Demon seeks revenge, Xiao Qian also starts to remember Yan.

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: Project Gutenberg
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police hunts for a counterfeiting gang led by a mastermind known as Painter. The gang is so skillful that it's almost impossible to distinguish between its counterfeit currency and real money. In an effort to find Painter's real identity, the Police recruits artist Lee Man to assist in solving the case.

programme.title: Love Never Ends
programme.desc: An empty-nest elderly man and a widowed elderly woman who collects scrap, meet unexpectedly and gradually develop feelings for each other. An elderly couple whose wife suffers from a serious illness, makes a living by selling scrap. Both these elderly couples fall deeply in love and prove that love never ends, even if there is no tomorrow!

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Last Suspect
programme.desc: Lawyer Chen receives a mysterious call demanding her to defend a murder suspect after her daughter is kidnapped, and is told that she can only save her daughter by winning the case. As she starts investigation with the police and evidence emerges, Chen discovers the truth and reveals the mastermind. Can she rescue her daughter in time?

programme.title: The Warlord
programme.desc: A bandit became a warlord in northern China by helping Russia fight against Japan. Due to his ignorance and silly behaviour, he is seen as a joke to everyone. The warlord is finally killed by the daughter of a troupe master whom he had killed for no reason, bringing a befitting end to a traitor.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ruffians
programme.desc: A gang of unemployed martial artists seem to have their bad fortunes turned when the head of a local security agency hires them to take out the competition, who their new employer insists is up to no good. However, the men are being played for fools and have to take each other on until the last drop of blood is spilled.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: One Way Only
programme.desc: Danny is a motorbike workshop owner, once was a renowned motorcycle racer, but were seriously injured in an illegal race. Mai, student of Danny, wins a race in Macau under Danny's help. However, because of money and honour, Mai joins illegal races. After knowing this, Li persuades Mai to stop illegal races, but Mai seems cannot find his way out

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: Kid From Kwangtung
programme.desc: After many years as a respected actor and action choreographer, the Shaw Studio finally gave the dependable and commendable Hsu Hsia a chance to direct his own movies. He didn't waste the opportunity, inviting three other kung-fu designers to help on this fight-filled thriller. Wang Yu, co-star of such classics as Dirty Ho and The Kid With A Tattoo, here takes center stage as a young rascal caught between an anti-Ching Confederation and violent, vengeful Ching troops. But when he discovers that the good guys are led by master martial arts actor Jen Shih-kuan and the bad guys are led by the incredible Huang Cheng-li everyone knows that loads of great kung-fu is in store.

programme.title: The Emperor And The Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: Man Of Iron
programme.desc: Chou Lian Huan (Chen Kuan Tai) is good at fist fighting in Shanghai. In order to please a hostess named Chen Ju Fang (Ching Li), he is willing to sacrifice everything and fight against the son of the gang leader in Shanghai. However, is Chous action worth it?

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxus enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: Purple Darts
programme.desc: A girl vows to take revenge for her parents who were murdered by four outlaws when she was only a baby. To do so, she trains hard at martial arts and teams up with a swordsman and a couple to finally kill them all.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: This erotic comedy anthology features three stories about an old man who dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop who goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a barber's apprentice who encounters a lively corpse in a night vigil. Through playing all these characters, Michael Hui proves himself as a genius of Hong Kong comedy.

programme.title: Rape Of The Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: The Kung-Fu Instructor
programme.desc: Wong Yang is a famous martial artist who is forced to teach kung fu to the Mong Clan, an evil clan which is trying to destroy its nemesis, the Chow Clan. Chow Ping from the Chow Clan is a student of Wongs caught in the Mongs territory and as punishment, the Mong Clan wants to cut off Chow Pings limbs. Wong steps in to defend his student.

programme.title: Mr Funny - Bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: Shaolin Martial Arts
programme.desc: The Qing government assigns fighters to destroy Shaolin Temple and kill all the disciples, but two of them successfully escaped. They train under different masters and learn the Wing Chun and Hung Quan styles respectively, finally killing the fighters and taking revenge for the death of their fellow disciples.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: Starring the stunning, teenage heartthrob Pat Ting Hung, The Butterfly Chalice marks the important directing debut of the kung-fu film genre's most principle figure Chang Cheh, as he burst the martial arts and swordplay movie doors wide open, announcing the beginning of the end for the Cantonese musicals.

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: This is adapted from Louis Chas The Book and the Sword. A young swordsman is tasked to lead a patriotic secret society to fight the traitorous general who colludes with the enemy. At the same time, he encounters a female warrior and two beautiful princesses, and is caught between all their affections for him.

programme.title: Sex, Love And Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword masters daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become The Five Shaolin Masters.

programme.title: Lover'S Rock
programme.desc: Pan Lei, winner the China Literary Award for three consecutive years, wrote and directed this film about the lives and loves of a fishing village. It starred the glorious Cheng Pei-pei in her first film as a woman (she had debuted in a mans role), and her much-lauded performance won her the prestigious Golden Accolade Award from the International Association Of Independent Producers a first for any Asian woman.

programme.title: Vengeance Of A Snow Girl
programme.desc: A crippled woman seeks vengeance against the four men who killed her parents. However, when she crosses path with a young warrior who falls in love with her, trouble ensues as his father is one of the killers responsible for her family's massacre years ago.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: The Secret Of The Dirk
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the City of Liu are forced to flee when the vicious Black Tigers gang raids their city, but are able to hide all their gold and treasures in a valley. A team of swordswomen led by Liu wants to get their hands on the treasures before the bandits, but both parties will have to contend with the wandering swordsman Chou for them...

programme.title: Tales Of A Eunuch
programme.desc: Tales Of A Eunuch reunites the potent mix of martial arts superstar Gordon Liu, who plays Emperor in cognito Kang Hsi, with the kung-fu comedienne Wang Yu, an anti-Ching revolutionary. It is a film laced with wild barrages of excellent martial arts chiefly choreographed by Yuen Hua and Yuan Pien; Jackie Chan's long-time kung-fu classmates. At one time, Wang was considered to be the next Alexander Fu Sheng.

programme.title: Na Cha The Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend Investiture of the Gods, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: After a notorious rapist Xiao kills his master and the entire clan, Han the last surviving disciple, decides to take revenge. He must find the legendary Hulong Blade to counter Xiao's Evil Poisonous Sword, but as Han has never seen Xiao before, he is deceived when Xiao poses as an ally to try and steal his Blade in the process.

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: The Swordmates
programme.desc: Li asks his swordmate Wang to protect his family while he is away, but Wang rapes his wife and even has his convoy attacked. Li escaped but fears his daughter is still in danger, so he asks the nephew of his master to help protect her

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: The Heroic Ones
programme.desc: The story is set in the Tang Dynasty and David Chiang plays the 13th Prince, a powerful fighter whose prestigious status provokes jealously, leading to a gruesome family feud.

programme.title: The Blue And The Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: The Duel Of The Century
programme.desc: A duel has been arranged at the Forbidden City between two formidable swordsmen of the martial world, Ye Gu Cheng and Xi Men Chui Xue. Lu Xiao Feng smells something fishy about the duel as the two swordsmen never met and do not have any conflicts. He decides to investigate more with Hua Man Lou, and eventually uncovers some hidden conspiracies

programme.title: Vanamagan
programme.desc: An Andaman tribal who escapes from men trying to capture his people, ends up in the care of a spoilt, rich girl, who starts to fall in love with him. The Film features Jayam Ravi & Sayeesha in the lead roles

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Tamil Action Film, Starring, M. Sasikumar, Shamna Kasim, Mahima Nambiar, Sanusha, Inder Kumar & Others

programme.title: Mappla Singam
programme.desc: Tamil Comedy Film, Starring, Vimal, Anjali, Soori & Others

programme.title: Enakku Vaaitha Adimaigal
programme.desc: Tamil Comedy Drama, Jai, Pranitha Subhash, Kaali Venkat, Karunakaran, Rajendran & Others

programme.title: Varappogum 24 Manikkul
programme.desc: Tamil Film, Starring, Eesha Rebba; Satyadev Kancharana, Sriram, Ganesh Venkatraman & Others

programme.title: Bhaskar Oru Rascal
programme.desc: Tamil Action Comedy Movie, Starring, Arvind Swamy, Amala Paul, Baby Nainika, Soori, Master Raghavan & Others

programme.title: Free Ticket
programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Coffee With Kadhal
programme.desc: Tamil romantic comedy family drama film, Starring - Jiiva, Jai, Srikanth, Malvika Sharma, Amritha Aiyer, Raiza Wilson, Aishwarya Dutta, Samyuktha Shanmuganathan & Dhivyadharshini

programme.title: Mohini
programme.desc: Tamil horror thriller film, Starring, Trisha Krishnan, Jackky Bhagnani, Yogi Babu, Ganeshkar, Jangiri Madhumitha & Others

programme.title: Kappal
programme.desc: Tamil Comedy Film, Vaibhav Reddy, Sonam Bajwa, Karunakaran, VTV Ganesh & Others

programme.title: Movies -` Latchiyam Oru Thayin Aasai
programme.desc: Tamil Dance Movie, Starring, Prabhu Deva, Ragava Lawrence & Others

programme.title: Veetla Visesham
programme.desc: Tamil comedy drama film, Starring - RJ Balaji, Sathyaraj, Urvashi, Aparna Balamurali, K.P.A.C. Lalitha

programme.title: Krack
programme.desc: Tamil Action Thriller Movie, Starring, Ravi Teja, Shruti Haasan, Samuthirakani, and Varalaxmi Sarathkumar

programme.title: Ezra
programme.desc: Tamil Thriller Horror Film, Starring, Prithviraj Sukumaran, Priya Anand, Tovino Thomas, Sujith Shanker & Others

programme.title: Akhanda
programme.desc: Tamil Action Film, Starring, Nandamuri Balakrishna, Pragya Jaiswal, Jagapathi Babu, Meka Srikanth & Others

programme.desc: Film Songs

programme.title: Karnan
programme.desc: Tamil Action Drama Film, Starring, Dhanush, Lal, Rajisha Vijayan, Yogi Babu

programme.title: Nota
programme.desc: Tamil Political Thriller Film, Starring, Vijay Devarakonda, Mehrene Kaur Pirzada, Yashika Aannand, Nassar, Sanchana Natarajan & Others

programme.title: Podhuvaga En Manasu Thangam
programme.desc: Tamil Thriller Romantic Movie, Starring, Udhayanidhi Stalin, Nivetha Pethuraj, Parthiepan, Soori, Mayilsamy,Rajendran & Others

programme.title: Ka Pe Ranasingam
programme.desc: Tamil political-drama movie, starring, Vijay Sethupathi, Aishwarya Rajesh, Munishkanth, and Vela Ramamoorthy

programme.title: My Dear Bootham
programme.desc: Tamil children fantasy comedy drama film, Starring - Prabhu Deva, Ashwanth Ashokkumar & Remya Nambeesan

programme.title: Mirchi Masala
programme.desc: Tamil Romantic Action Movie, Prabhas, Anushka Shetty & Others

programme.title: Bhaagmathie

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Official Ozian Exam - Dorothy must pass the Oziam Exam to be able to stay in Oz but first she has to save Munchkinland from a terrible dragon who has taken refuge on the Sapphire City. Can Dorothy save the city and study?

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Locket Locket In My Pocket - Wilhelmina finds a magic locket that allows her to look like whoever's picture she keeps in it. So she takes the form of Dorothy and misbehaves at the fair and now Dorothy must clear her name.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Mixed-Up Mixer - The Lion is named King of the Forest now he has his medal of courage. Will his trek over water, darkness and spiders be too much for this scaredy cat? Or will he learn the real meaning of courage?

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Ojo The Unlucky - While making cookies Dorothy accidentally pours the Potion of Life into the mixing bowl, causing disaster! Dorothy must use the mirror to change the Potion of Life into the Liquid of Petrification.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Lion's Share - A love magnet is a great Valentine's Day gift but it magically makes everyone fall in love with Dorothy, overwhelming her. Could there be such a thing as too much love?

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep13
programme.desc: Nani Bird Visits - Big Birds aunt, Nani Bird, is visiting from Hawaii and shares with Elmo, Abby and Nina special things she, Big Bird and their family do in Hawaii.

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep14
programme.desc: Family Album - While making a photo album, the friends learn about melanin, and people in a family can look the same or different but are still the same family.

programme.title: Dolphin Tale
programme.desc: A young boy convinces a doctor to create an attachment for his new dolphin friend to swim better.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts And Where To Find Them
programme.desc: A Magizoologist arrives in New York amid tensions in the wizarding world only to be branded as a fugitive as he tries to recover his missing beasts.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep5
programme.desc: King Of The Castle - Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max next travel to Castle Bishopbrook to visit a distant relative who's royalty, but when Ben encounters a 'ghost' at the haunted home, it turns out to actually be his new rival, Kevin 11, throwing even more twisted aliens his way: Thornblade, Undertow, and Dark Matter!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Speechless On The Seine - While in Paris, France, Ben catches Zombozo robbing the Louvre, but when Zombozo hypnotizes Ben to remain speechless, Ben must navigate a foreign land like a mime in order to stop the criminal clown and his travelling circus.

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Poles Apart - A trip to the South Pole goes upside down when Team Tennyson lands on the North Pole instead, but Ben quickly discovers the culprits: Solar & Polar Twain, magnetically-powered scientists who want to hold the world ransom by threatening to reverse Earth's magnetic poles!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Show Don't Tell - Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max arrive at a Native American national park to witness the Ayasha Plinths - an ancient Stonehenge-like rock formation - but when the sinister sorcerer Hex arrives, Ben must battle against a beast Hex magically made out of huge rocks!

programme.title: Ben 10 S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Don't Touch - Team Tennyson checks out a Samurai Museum in Tokyo, where Ben is too impatient to wait out the Calligraphy experience for the more exciting-sounding Samurai one, but when a dangerous Samurai sword is stolen from the exhibit, Ben must take on its thief - the new Big Bad in town, the Forever Knight.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep3
programme.desc: A Mystery Solving Gang Divided! - Scooby-Doo and the gang travel to Chambersburg a battlefield near Gettysburg to investigate the mysterious appearance of ghost zombie Civil War soldiers.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo And Guess Who? S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Revenge Of The Swamp Monster! - Scooby-Doo and the Mystery Inc. gang meet up with basketball legend and bowling aficionado Chris Paul at a golf tournament fundraiser held in Florida.

programme.desc: Peebles' Pet Shop Of Terrible Terrors! - Scooby and the gang meet Wanda Sykes.

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep11

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Rise Of The Nome King - The Nome King tricks Dorothy into using the Magic Magnifying Glass on him, and once he's big enough, he makes himself a giant who can take over Oz. So Dorothy will have to make everything else big!

programme.title: Dorothy And The Wizard Of Oz S1 Ep13

programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S5 Ep10
programme.desc: Charlie Foxtrot - An armed hit team lays siege on Robins Nest. TC is badly injured while Rick fights for his life.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S5 Ep11
programme.desc: Hit And Run - Magnum and Higgins go to work for a dangerous and controversial client. Kumu and Shammy help move TC to a veterans rehab facility. Rick flirts with a woman who works at the marina.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S5 Ep12
programme.desc: Three Bridges - Magnum and Higgins try to help Zhao, a close friend of Kumu, recover her life savings that was all lost to a scammer. TC becomes increasingly frustrated at the lack of progress in his recovery and pushes everyone away.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S5 Ep13
programme.desc: Appetite For Danger - Magnum and Higgins enlist Katsumoto to go undercover when a chef at a high-end restaurant goes missing. Kumu works with Cade at the Cultural Center, confronting one of Americas darker chapters the internment of Japanese Americans in the wake of Pearl Harbor.

programme.title: Pretty Cheaters, Deadly Lies
programme.desc: After being tricked into a compromising situation, high school senior Hannah Fletcher thinks she can stop her cousin Madisons blackmail by taking her college entrance exam for her. But nothing is enough for Madison, and her plans soon become deadly

programme.title: SurrealEstate S2 Ep4
programme.desc: I Put A Spell On You - Luke sparks with a charming homeowner while negotiating a land deal. Zooey goes out on her first sales call as a newly-minted real estate agent.

programme.title: SurrealEstate S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Art & Science - Luke must separate the artist from the art when a client's home refuses to let her leave. August revisits his old workplace to find the past doesn't always move on.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S11 Ep105
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Oxenfree
programme.desc: Three estranged foster brothers rediscover the ruins of their childhood kingdom 'Oxenfree'...and face down the monster living within.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep9
programme.desc: Heroes Night - Each team is tasked with creating their own superhero power as they battle their way through difficult dance routines, in hopes of advancing to the semi-final. The talented kids and their untrained parents perform routines to hits.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep10
programme.desc: Semi-Final - The four remaining teams dance not once, but twice to prove they have what it takes to advance to the grand finale. The final four perform routines to top songs.

programme.title: Come Dance With Me Ep11
programme.desc: Grand Finale - The judges and choreographers kick off the shows season finale with an epic dance, then the three final kid-parent teams perform encores of the judges favorite routines from the season with the winning duo taking home the $100,000 grand prize!

programme.title: Making It (Australia) Ep1
programme.desc: Meet The Makers - From pottery and pyrography to carving, crocheting and even a Chris Hemsworth lampshade, Making It Australia is the new crafting and DIY series, which brings together the countrys most talented Makers to showcase their artistic genius. The show will be hosted by comedian, actor and writer Susie Youssef and comedian, Harley Breen. Joyful and inspiring, the series will celebrate the transformative power of art and craft.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown S3 Ep4
programme.desc: A History in the Baking - The seven remaining home bakers use their noodles to make chocolate pasta.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Cold-Blooded Killers Ep4

programme.desc: Embrace an invasive nutria whos become part of the family, paddle around with Gumbo the goose, and visit a blind hedgehog and his human chum. Explore a swimmers bond with wild gray seals and hang out with Cosima the monkey and Jasper the serval.

programme.title: Wild Crusades 1 - The Monkey Diaries Ep3
programme.desc: Hidden in the jungles of Sri Lanka is the toque macaque. Endemic to the island, these feisty group-living monkeys are found nowhere else on earth. programme.desc: The finalists level up childhood favourites and cater for a celebrity party attended by Michael Dapaah and AJ Tracey with the help of the eliminated cooks.

programme.title: The Great Pottery Throw Down S4 Ep7
programme.desc: It's Garden Week and the remaining potters face a green-fingered challenge to build an animal water feature and throw a strawberry planter, for a place in the quarter-finals.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off S12 Ep5
programme.desc: German Week - It's a Bake Off first, as the bakers attempt to perfect traditional German biscuits and make a torte fit for a prince, before rising to the challenge with a showstopping tiered cake using yeast.

programme.title: Sort Your Life Out S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Stacey Solomon and her crack team help childhood sweethearts Dan and Char and their two daughters, Mia and Cece, transform their family home through a life-changing declutter.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Cornwall has more than its fair share of folktales. Perhaps the most famous is found near Land's End, where Rick recounts the tale of the Mermaid of Zennor. A short distance away, Rick joins a small army of seaweed harvesters who are feeding an increasing appetite for a natural food more common in Japan.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off S12 Ep6
programme.desc: Pastry Week - It's Pastry Week and the bakers tackle choux pastry doughnuts and a tricky Turkish technical, before creating a savoury, delicately designed showstopping pastry pie packed full of flavour.

programme.title: The Great Cookbook Challenge with Jamie Oliver S1 Ep1
programme.desc: From home cooks and professional chefs, to Instagrammers and those who just love cooking for their family and friends, the first six cooks pitch their book ideas and their dishes to the judges.

programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond the Lobby S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Schloss Elmau, Germany - Monica and Giles travel into the snowy Alps to work behind the scenes in a hotel that offers six spa areas with the world's leading musicians playing for the guests in the evening.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Cornwall S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Cornwall has more than its fair share of folktales. Perhaps the most famous is found near Land's End, where Rick recounts the tale of the Mermaid of Zennor. programme.title: The Great South African Bake Off S4 Ep6
programme.desc: Greens Week - This week on The Great South African Bake off, the bakers are celebrating vegetables through a range of delicious challenges. Siba and Paul task them with vegetarian galettes, a traditional Turkish flatbread, and vegetable showstoppers.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep20
programme.desc: The Case Of The Big Wall Of Bricks - Fuse has a new electronic ball. Noddy suggests that they invite everyone to play with it later. Fuse agrees but when Noddy returns with the other toys there is a big brick wall in front of the workshop. No one can get in and there's no sign of Fuse! Noddy uses all his investigating skills to follow the clues. He discovers that Fuse built the brick wall to stop his friends coming into the workshop because he was worried his new electronic ball might get broken. Noddy helps him feel comfortable with sharing his toy ball after all the other toys promise to be super careful with it. Now everyone can play together! Yay for Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep20
programme.desc: Why Mosquito Buzzes - You see there was time when Mosquito didn't buzz. Mosquito was as quiet as quiet can be and did she like to tell tales. One day Mosquito tells the Monkeys that the sun looks very low in the sky. Maybe it's sad and doesn't want to rise!' worry the Monkeys. Mosquito flits off to spread the news - The sun is never going to rise again!' soon the whole of Tinga Tinga is in complete panic The Sun is never going to rise again!' Of course, the sun does rise again and all is right again in Tinga Tinga. But the animals decide to tie a grass around Mosquito's tail. From that day on Mosquito buzzes and everyone can swot her away rather than listen to her gossipy tales. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep20
programme.desc: Testing Time For Maxi - PC Pete and Nick are up at Silver hatch giving the cars their road tests. Is Maxi really going to be as good as he says he is or will he be unpleasantly surprised?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep20
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Sorting Machine - Pat and Jess are called to Cardiff to collect a new sorting machine when the Pencaster machine breaks down. Whilst they negotiate with Rowena Roberts, the Cardiff sorting office manager, as to how to move the heavy machine onto the SDS plane, Ben is fighting his own battles at the Pencaster office as his merry band of helpers from the village cause more chaos in their attempts to sort the post!After a quick tour of Gilbertson Castle, Pat and Jess manage to get the new sorting machine to Pencaster just in time to deliver a missing birthday present to Meera. Happy Birthday Meera and well done, Postman Pat!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep8
programme.desc: Bad Egg - Magnus hatches a plan to hide in an egg to spy on the Rescue Riders. But things get all scrambled when a mama dragon takes him to her nest.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep34
programme.desc: Cementasaurs - Ty is pushed into a quicksand-like pool of wet cement by the wild Cementasaurs, and it's up to the Reptoolsto quickly rescue him before he sinks

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep34
programme.desc: Deuce Is Wild/To Fire A Squire - Whiplash tries to scare Deuce and Edvard straight, but the plan backfires; After Turbo saves his life, Buster Move waits on Turbo's every need.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep34
programme.desc: Newbeings On The Block / Juicy Gossip - When an alien moves into the apartment above them, Oh thinks he's a threat to earth but nobody believes him; Oh befriends the Busy Bodies on Lucy's behalf

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep54
programme.desc: The Frontier Fillies Summer Outdoor Jubilee - Lucky's competitive side comes out at the Frontier Fillies' Summer Outdoor Jubilee when the PALs meet the BUDs -- a group of talented young rivals.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep55
programme.desc: The Frontier Fillies Great Legacy Race - The PALs are determined to place first in a race for the coveted Frontier Fillies Legacy Pin. But the BUDs are willing to do anything to win.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep19
programme.desc: There Will Be Eggs / I Think We're Alone Meow - Eep & Thunk want to be in on the new fad of Slateboarding, but must find something to trade with (eggs). Bud and Crud try to corner the egg market/Gran takes in a group of crabby tabbies, and uses their combined crabbiness to get whatever she wants. Grug and Ugga try to get into Snoot's food-sharing party.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep20
programme.desc: Freepy Friday - Grug and Eep get into an argument and end up switching places to prove how hard it is to the other to be them. We follow Eep as the parent and Grug as the teenager at school and at home

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep47
programme.desc: The Fumbling of Football Mike - After Boss accidentally sells Tim's favorite Football Mike toy at a family yard sale, he shirks his duties as a CEO to try to get it back. But the villains pick up on his one weakness, his brother, and so begins a game of elaborate keep-away.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep46
programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. Convinced he's the victim of a conspiracy, Boom leaves a wake of parent worry in his path, forcing Boss to stop him.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep3
programme.desc: Blade of the Red Phoenix - Po and the kids are recruited to perform in Mei Mei's theatrical show, but things take a turn when Jindiao ruins the play in order to find a mystical scroll

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep5
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Terrifying Perilous Misfortune of the T.P. Mummy - After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harolds latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep34
programme.desc: Stryke Out - Hiccup and Toothless are captured and must find a way to escape the Dragon Fighting arena and survive an attack from the fearsome Triple Stryke dragon.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep8
programme.desc: Eye'll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry - Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep34
programme.desc: The Butterfly War - King Julien declares a war against butterflies to raise his kingdom's spirit, but when the village is destroyed he decides to hold a peace summit.
